name: Street Fighter
description: O dano de seus ataques desarmados escala com seu atributo de 'Combate Desarmado'
attackingDamage: if (damage.SkillUsed.Is("unnarmed")) return amount * creature.GetStatValue("unnarmed_combat", 1); return amount;
ModifyAttackingDamage: if (damage.SkillUsed.Is("unnarmed")) return amount * creature.GetStatValue("unnarmed_combat", 1); return amount;
